segments.text: Do you know how late it is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My fault . I didn't realize what time it was .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope you don't think that excuse lets you off the hook .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . I'm telling the truth .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Haven't I asked you to call if you're going to be home late ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is true , but it must've slipped my mind .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Regardless , all you had to do was give a call .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come home late one more time , and you'll find your stuff outside .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You want to throw me out over this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right , maybe then you'll respect my rules .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine , because if I leave , then your rules won't matter .
segments.speaker: S2
